message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $800000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and rarity.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice. However, I think $800000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $600000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.
